column2: (progn (setq vm-fileio-base (let* ((forms-file (getenv "NEOVM_FORMS_FILE")) (base (if forms-file (file-name-directory forms-file) default-directory))) (expand-file-name "directory-files-fixtures/" base))) (file-name-nondirectory (directory-file-name vm-fileio-base)))

(let ((default-directory vm-fileio-base)) (condition-case err (with-temp-buffer (insert "neo") (write-region nil nil "vm-write.tmp") (prog1 (file-exists-p "vm-write.tmp") (delete-file "vm-write.tmp"))) (list 'error (car err) (nth 1 err))))
